Hello Elena,

In regards of your latest inquiry:

Did I understand correctly that if sensitive content is monitored and blocked by the CAP policy, and I specified DPI URL Monitored Categories inside the CAP, then the blocking will apply only to the websites listed under those Categories?


The CAP policy which have the DPI URL Monitored Categories added will inspect only those websites for uploads, but that doesn't mean the blocking is disabled for the rest of your apps such as Outlook/Teams etc.

For example: If you added in the DPI monitored list WeTransfer, the policy will check only for WeTransfer but will allow it for DropBox.
